Book with confidence Offers & Best Sellers Skydive Airlie Beach combines the best views, ultimate convenience, unparalleled excitement and has been operating for 30 years! We are proud to be the only skydive operator based in central Airlie Beach, offering unmatched convenience and accessibility for tourists. No long transfers, no wasted time – just pure adventure, right in the heart of the action. Skydive Australia at Airlie Beach offers a once-in-a-lifetime thrill with spectacular views of the Great Barrier Reef and the turquoise waters of the Whitsundays. UP TO 8,000FT TANDEM SKYDIVE UP TO 8,000FT TANDEM SKYDIVE Tandem skydive from up to 8,000ft over the Whitsunday Islands Up to 10-20 seconds of freefall 3 month membership of the Australian Parachute Federation Personalised certificate of achievement Please note that surcharges may apply if 94kg or over. Please read our Terms & Conditions before booking Includes compulsory Personal Accident Insurance from the Australian Parachute Federation All prices are in AUD$ From $ 309 or 4 x $ 77.25 with Book Now Gift Voucher Bestseller! Airlie Beach 15,000ft Tandem Skydive Airlie Beach 15,000ft Tandem Skydive Tandem skydive from up to 15,000ft over the Whitsunday Islands! Up to 60 seconds of freefall! Video and photos not included, select these as an ‘extra’ in the cart Personalised certificate of achievement Please note that surcharges may apply if 94kg or over. Please read our Terms & Conditions before booking Includes compulsory Personal Accident Insurance from the Australian Parachute Federation All prices are in AUD$ From $ 369 or 4 x $ 92.25 with Book Now Gift Voucher See All Prices & Packages View availability Close Close Airlie Beach Quick Facts There are 507 berths at Abell Point Marina, a whole lot of boats to see from the sky. Airlie’s home to an African bar with a zebra-striped dance floor. And yes, you need to go. Keep an eye out for whales migrating if you skydive between June and September! Lonely Planet dubbed this the second-best place in Australia. Sorry, Sydney. Skydive Airlie Beach TROPICAL VIBES & TINGLES ALONG YOUR SPINE. NO COMBO QUITE LIKE IT. A roaring bar scene, unfathomable natural beauty and rarely a day below 25 degrees. Oh yes, Airlie Beach delivers on the hype and big promises. Prepare to be sun-soaked and semi-nude every day of your visit, with balmy nights of beach parties thumped in between. It’s a coconut cake of a place and your skydive will be the icing. Get ready to soar over the Whitsundays at almost 200km/hr, admiring Hayman and Hamilton Island on the descent. About Airlie Beach Dropzone Using special wrist-mounted, high-resolution cameras, our instructors capture your entire skydive experience. So you can show everyone the magic of the moment – and the sheer lunacy of your freefall face. Add your video package to your booking during checkout, or purchase at the drop zone on the day of your skydive! View Media Packages Wonderfully Picture Perfect ← Move left → Move right ↑ Move up ↓ Move down + Zoom in - Zoom out Home Jump left by 75% End Jump right by 75% Page Up Jump up by 75% Page Down Jump down by 75% Map data ©2026 Google Map data ©2026 Google Terms Report a map error Airlie Beach Skydive Australia Building, Air Whitsunday Road, Whitsunday Airport, Flame Tree, QLD 4802 Get Directions Getting there Our Airlie Beach Drop Zone Conveniently located at Whitsunday Airport, between Funnel and Shute Bay, Skydive Airlie Beach is the definition of scenic from start to finish. The gateway to the Great Barrier Reef with easy access to Hayman and Hamilton Island, skydiving will sit in first place on a very long list of things to do. Strap yourself in for a skydive that lands you in heaven on earth! Get Directions Travel With Us Get the good feels flowing as early as possible by tapping into our free transfers from selected spots around Airlie Beach. Whether your teeth are jittering or your excitement is overflowing, being around fellow adrenalin junkies before the fall is always a good idea. Contact us to lock in your spot and confirm your pick up location. Make Your Own Way Less than a 10-minute drive from the doorstep of Paddy’s Shenanigans, the sojourn to Skydive Airlie Beach couldn’t be easier. Motoring in from Mackay or Townsville isn’t out of the question either. Type Skydive Airlie Beach into your navigation and you’ll be suiting up for the sky in a few hours and a couple of easy turns. Parking on-site is free and you could swing a cat to a nearby cafe (provided you’re a good swing). Stay & Play Whether you hit the islands to hone in on your inner Castaway character or stay and play on the mainland, this part of Australia is hard to tear away from. When your skydive wraps up but your energy is still sky-high, Airlie Beach will offer all the kick-ons you deserve. Contemplate your crazy at Fish D’vine and Rum Bar, seek out a swimming hole or head out on a sailing boat to get the wind back in your hair.
